# Government Tender Announcement
## Main Pier Breakwater Design
Riding Mountain National Park, Canada

### Solicitation Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-8340-67595624
- **Amendment Number**: 6
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0160/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-08-21
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-27T16:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-10-05
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-01-19
- **Tender Status**: Expired

### Project Description
Parks Canada is seeking a consultant to design an integrated solution for the repair of the Main Pier breakwater at Clear Lake in Riding Mountain National Park. The primary focus will be on breakwater repairs.

- Estimated value: $100,001 to $250,000 (excluding taxes)
- Contract period: The contractor will have until January 19, 2024 to complete the work

### Supplier Information
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
- **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba, Canada

### Bidding Instructions
- Bids must be submitted via email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca or fax to 1-855-983-1808
- The maximum file size for email attachments is 15 megabytes
- Enquiries about the solicitation must be submitted in writing and received at least 8 business days before the closing date

### Document Requirements
- Tender Documentation is available at canadabuys.canada.ca
- All correspondence regarding this solicitation should be sent to the Contracting Authority.
